Privacy-Policy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy-Policy.description: Your privacy is our top priority. Learn about our commitment to protecting your personal information in our clear and concise privacy policy.
Privacy-Policy.section-one: We value privacy and respect the privacy of those who visit our website. No identifiable information is stored or accessed without your permission to ensure that we do not infringe upon your privacy.
Privacy-Policy.section-two: Because our site contains links to third-party websites, we cannot prevent tracking outside of our domain.
Privacy-Policy.section-three: Usage data that your browser provides (User-Agent), includes IP addresses, browsers and devices used. This data is used for metrics and server communications.

a11y.new-window: The link will open in a new window or tab

Resources.heading: Stay Safe Online with Our Essential Security Toolkit
Resources.subheading: Handpicked by me, the essential security resources for protecting your digital life

meta.title: Security Toolkit: Essential for Online Safety
meta.description: Stay safe online with our curated list of the best security tools and services. From phishing protection to malware reporting, we've got you covered.

phish.title: Reporting Phishing Scams
phish.subheading: Don't Fall for Scams: Find resources to detect and report Phishing.
phish.p-1: Phishing explained: A type of online scam where attackers trick individuals into providing sensitive information, such as login credentials or financial information. These scams can appear on websites, emails, and text messages and often take the form of links to popular websites or fake sites that look legitimate.
phish.p-2: Detection: it is important to first check if the link has already been reported. There are several online services that can be used to scan the URL of the phishing link. It is important not to click on the link and instead, copy the link address and paste it into the scanning service.
phish.google: , blocks content across the google ecosystem.
phish.microsoft: , blocks content on edge and windows services
phish.urlscan: , provides helpful information about the website such as IP/domain details
